posts.post_content:
Strictly for my personal collection:

I am looking for Plow Boy Cabinets of Chicago Cubs players.  If you have one available, please reach me here or at [url]peterc@ha.com[/url].

Thanks,
Peter

Thank you to those who have contacted me with offerings.  I should have just posted this.  These are the Cubs I need:

Mordecai Brown
Johnny Kling
Rube Kroh
Harry McIntyre
Francis Pfeffer
Wildfire Schulte
Heinie Zimmerman

Peter,

I am breaking up a large collection of these, and will have Brown, Schulte and Pfeffer among others in my January Auction, as well as the Spring auction in 2025
